invalidClient: Your client is invalid! Please use the current SurgeBrawl client from the Football Brawl official website.
oldClient: Your client is out of date! Please use the current SurgeBrawl client from the Football Brawl official website.
maintenanceStarted: Maintenance has started on the server! Come back later!
error: An error has been occured! Please try rejoin!
leavedBeforeBattleEnds:
You quit the last game.
Your earned trophies and tokens have burned out!
Next time, don't leave the battle before it's over!
removedBuggedSP:
Hey! An update has been released!
Your account has been spotted with a STAR POWER bug!
We have removed some star powers so you can continue play as ElPrimo, Colt, Jessie, Brock, Dynamike, Piper, Leon and Spike!

bans.gemsExploiting: Using cheats to cheat in-game currency.

offers.nah: I'm too lazy to come up with a name for this offer.

gameroom.helpCommand:
Commands:
/monster - enable the SUPERCITY RAMPAGE mode in the gameroom.
gameroom.surgebothello:
Welcome to the gameroom.
My name is SurgeBot. Your faithful assistant.
Type "/help" to find out about all commands!

club.tokenMessage:
Your token: {}
Save the token! We recommend sharing the token only with the project administration, otherwise you have a chance to lose your account

Colored nick!
Additional trophys per game! (2-4)
Additional resources from the boxes! (x2)
BACKGROUNDS FROM OLD VERSIONS?!
Discounts on offers!
Doubled Daily Bonus!

club.noRequests: There are no requests for linking your account yet
club.linkSuccess: You have successfully linked your account to the bot.
club.linkNotSuccess: An error has occurred! Please try again later.
club.comeLaterBonus: It's too early! Come {} by Moscow!
club.bonusGet: You get {} BIG BOX tokens from the daily bonus!
club.helpCommand:
Club commands:
/stats - server stats
/token - your token
/pro - some info about prostatus
/boxes - get information about boxes
/prohelp - commands for pro-status holders!
/bonus - get a daily bonus.
/promo [promo] - enter a promo code for PRO-STATUS!
club.proStatusHelp:
Commands for pro-status:
/theme - change the background in the main menu
/prof - close/open profile
club.surgebothello:
Welcome to the club! I am SurgeBot! Your faithful assistant!
Type "/help" to find out about all commands!
club.clubErrorDesc:
Oops, an unexpected error occurred while retrieving club information!
Please try again. If the error persists, contact the administrators
club.cannotChangeThemeCauseHalloween: Unfortunately, you cannot change the theme during HALLOWEEN!

inbox:
UPDATE FROM 10/18/21 (#1)
Leaderboards have been rewritten.
Now every 3 weeks the season will be reset.
Promocodes can now be entered in the "Author Code"
Club mail has been developed.
The command /monster has been moved to the gameroom bot

UPDATE FROM 10/18/21 (#2)
You can close your statistics with PRO-STATUS! (COMMAND /PROF IN CLUB)
Also, for fun, chat was introduced in game rooms.
Repaired getting starpoints.
The club leaderboard has been added.
You can now get trophy brawlers from the shop after reaching their number.

UPDATE FROM 11/09/21:
Improved account security
Improved offers.
Now skins must be obtained from boxes.
Added translation into English and Ukrainian.
Now game modes change every hour.

CLIENT UPDATE FROM 09/11/21:
Now the "Play" button takes you IMMEDIATELY INTO BATTLE!
Added useful information on the top left (near the trophy road)
Added 2 new backgrounds for PRO-STATUS!

UPDATE FROM 08/19/21:
Now you can see when the user was online in the club.
The game will warn you 5 minutes before maintenance.
Added promo code system.

UPDATE FROM 07/25/21:
When you click on the Play button, you are thrown into the gameroom.
